body.name: Apache RC Military Helicopter, S109H Apache 1/28 2.4G 3CH Dual-Prop Gyro Airplane with Bright Night Navigation Lights, Remote Control Aircraft Toys for Beginner Boys (RTF Version)
body.stockDetail: Only 19 left in stock - order soon.
features: ❶Highly realistic aircraft model: This Apache helicopter model is designed to highly restore the realistic aircraft with a 3CH configuration and a gyro stabilizer with calibration function, providing smooth and enjoyable flights

❷Safety features: The helicopter boasts safety features like stuck protection and low-voltage protection. The receiver will protect the drive control system when operating at temperatures above the set limit and resume normal operation when temperatures are safe again

❸Basic and Highlight Functions: The helicopter has basic functions like ascend, descend, forward, backward, left & right turn, hover, fly left & right. It also has highlight functions like one key takeoff & landing, returning, emergency stop, as well as roll
❹Ready-to-Fly (RTF) version: The RTF version allows especially beginners and RC enthusiasts to start flying right out of the package
❺Perfect for personal use or as a gift: This helicopter is perfect for personal use or as a birthday gift for family, kids, and friends
body.description: Specifications:.Color: Army Green.Material: ABS + Electronic Components.Driving Motor: High-speed Strong Magnetic Brushed Motor.Servo: Digital Servo.Remote Control: 2.4G 3CH Remote Controller.Remote Control Distance: 10m.Aircraft Battery: 3.7V 150mAh Lithium Polymer Battery.Charger: USB Charger.Charging Time: Appr 60min.Usage Time: 6-8min.Product Dimensions: 19.5 x 7 x 9.5cmPackage Including.Aircraft *1.Instructions *1.USB Charger *1.Remote Controller *1
